subject: Automobile Racing
Blacks
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Darrell Wallace Jr. will compete in the Camping World Truck Series this season, becoming only the third black driver in the 65-year history of Nascar to secure a full-time ride in a national series.
snippet: Darrell Wallace Jr. will compete in the Camping World Truck Series this season, becoming only the third black driver in the 65-year history of Nascar to secure a full-time ride in a national series.
